# Spielwiese

```{r, fig.height=18, message=F, warning=F, chunky-chunk, echo=F}
games <- liga %>% 
  filter(Saison == 2, Runde == 1) %>% 
  select(Spiel, Spieler)

games <- data.frame(P1 = games[c(T, F), ],
                    P2 = games[c(F, T), ]) %>% 
  select(P1.Spieler, P2.Spieler)

games <- table(games$P1.Spieler, games$P2.Spieler)

games <- as.data.frame.matrix(games)

    format_table(games, list(
      Bjarne = formatter("span", 
            style = x ~ ifelse(x == 0, style(color = "green", font.weight = "bold"), NA))
    ),
      check.rows = F, format = "pandoc")
```
